scenario_title: Single-Event Email Fraud via Phishing Attack

why.details: Attacker aims to obtain sensitive credentials and financial data through phishing in email activities, then exploit them for unauthorized financial gain.

how.description: Crafted and sent phishing emails to targeted employees, imitating trusted sources.
how.procedure: Adversary uses email masquerading or spoofing to send malicious link or impersonate trusted sender to collect credentials or gain access. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
observable_evidence: Email sent from non-typical sender or address similar to trusted source
High number of recipients targeted in phishing campaign
Clickthrough logs showing link in email visited by user
how.impact: Compromise of user credentials leading to unauthorized access and subsequent financial fraud.

how.procedure: Adversary creates fake website mimicking legitimate login page, captures credentials entered by victims, and stores for later exploitation. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}
observable_evidence: Traffic logs showing user visits to known malicious domain

how.impact: Harvested credentials used to access systems, conduct financial transactions or further lateral attacks.
